page.title: 15A DAY IN MY LIFE PAGE 15
page.content: MY NAME IS DEBORAH AND I AM ELEVEN YEARS OLD I LIVE JUST OUT-SIDE ARDGLASS AND I HAVE A BROTHER WHO IS THIRTEEN AND HIS NAME IS DAVID.WHEN I GET UP IN THE MORNING I EAT MY BREAKFAST WHICH SOMETIMES IS FROSTIES CEREAL OR A BOILED EGG AND TOAST.AFTER I HAVE EATEN MY BREAKFAST I GO OUT-SIDE FOR A WALK WITH MY DOG OVER THE FIELDS EXPLORING.SOMETIMES WE SEE A RABBIT OR TWO BUT WHEN MY DOG TRIES TO CATCH THEM THEY RUN AWAY INTO THEIR BURROW. WHEN WE GO HOME I GIVE MY DOG HER DINNER.SHE GETS DOG MEAT AND SCRAPS WITH MILK POURED OVER IT. WHEN MY MUM AND DAD GET UP THEY EAT THEIR BREAKFAST AND MY BROTHER GETS SHREDDED WHEAT.THEN DAVID AND I GO OUT TO PLAY ON THE BIKES.
